**Note:**  
- For all transactions, except id `Expense20240202001`, the "invoice" (interpreted as the most reliable field per the instructions) matches the transaction record fields almost exactly.
- For `Expense20240202001`, the invoice says: "On February 02, 2024, an invoice was issued for a Sales Expenses, totaling $56421.46. The payment_method of this transaction was cash, and this transaction was paid. This transaction was prepared by Staff, and the approver is Director."
    - But the recorded_amount is **60326.93**, not **56421.46**, and recorded_payment/receipt_status is **Unpaid** not **Paid**.
- All other transactions show no internal inconsistencies as invoice values and recorded fields match.
- If you want only the transaction(s) with actual inconsistencies, you can keep only the last block.
